text: <@U0260V1BX>: that product be close is crazy similar. really interesting though that their plan is to use every type of sensor imaginable to cover the house. also stands out as for the much older demographic and ike they are pandering to them
yeah the giant red button is insane
this page is interesting though - they are trying to answer the same questions <http://beclose.com/whatisbeclose.aspx>

attachments.text: BeClose offers easy to use, affordable technology for seniors. Help seniors at home live safely and happily with BeClose remote caregiving solutions.

text: yea the giant red button is just way too much
i wonder how they deal with multiple users / fals alarms since it's mostly motion sensor based
yea no idea how that works with multiple people
also weird that the hub needs to be in a place that "has good cell phone reception"
